episodes.title: Ep 117:  The Cult of the Real Housewife (2025)
episodes.description: This week we attempt to untangle the turmoil surrounding The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City star Mary Cosby, and her Faith Temple Pentecostal Church. The investigative series raises big questions about power, control, and exploitation, but never fully commits - leaving us to wrestle with whether Mary is a victim, an opportunist, or something else entirely.
